features: One 105 fl oz bottle of ARM & HAMMER Sensitive Skin Laundry Detergent, Fresh Scent Liquid Laundry Detergent that cleans 105 medium loads when used as directed
Dermatologist-tested laundry detergent that's gentle on skin but tough on stains and odors, making it an ideal soap for sensitive skin
Dye-free detergent with a hypoallergenic fresh scent that has been tested by dermatologists and has passed four different clinical tests, so you can use this detergent worry-free
With trusted ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda, this HE laundry detergent is formulated to deeply clean clothes while being gentle on skin
HE laundry detergent is concentrated with 2X powerful stain fighters in every load versus leading value detergent, making it an effective and efficient laundry detergent
body.description: ARM & HAMMER Sensitive Skin Liquid Laundry Detergent is gentle on skin, but powerful on dirt. This HE laundry detergent liquid is concentrated with 2X powerful stain fighters in every load vs the leading value detergent, so it’s powerful enough to handle your toughest loads in all wash temperatures, even cold water. This laundry soap keeps laundry smelling fresh without irritating sensitive skin with a hypoallergenic, skin-friendly fresh scent that has been dermatologist-tested and passed four different clinical tests. This dye-free liquid laundry detergent is designed to work in standard and HE machines. For standard bottles, fill cap to Bar A for medium loads, or use half a capful for energy-saving cold water cycles compared to washing in warm water. Use a full cap of this dye-free detergent for large or heavily soiled loads. For larger dispenser sizes, fill to top of Line C for medium loads. For large or heavily soiled loads, use half a capful.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Arm & Hammer Sensitive Skin Free & Clear Liquid Laundry Detergent Arm & Hammer Sensitive Scent 5-in-1 Liquid Laundry Detergent Power Paks Arm & Hammer Clean & Simple In-Wash Light Scent Booster Lavender Escape Arm & Hammer Clean & Simple In-Wash Light Scent Booster Crisp Clean Arm & Hammer Sensitive Skin Plus Fresh Scent Liquid Laundry Detergent Scent Unscented Hypoallergenic Fresh Scent Lavender Escape Crisp Clean Hypoallergenic Fresh Scent For Use In All Washing Machines and All Water Temperatures All Washing Machines and All Water Temperatures All Washing Machines and All Water Temperatures All Washing Machines and All Water Temperatures All Washing Machines and All Water Temperatures Benefits This dermatologist tested and hypoallergenic washing detergent for sensitive skin is perfume, preservative, & dye free. These convenient pre-measured Power Paks combine ultra-concentrated laundry detergent with a hypoallergenic fresh scent that’s skin-friendly. In-wash scent boosters that are a sparkling mix of watery fruits and delicate blossoms to leave clothes smelling wonderfully fresh and clean, but not overpowering. Part herbal and part floral, Lavender Escape offers soothing comfort with a sweet, light herbal aroma delivered through tiny scent crystals for freshness that's not overpowering. Dye free laundry detergent specially formulated to eliminate tough dirt and odors all with a light, skin friendly scent that leaves clothes smelling great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I have always been a Arm & Hammer fan and I m never leaving them!
reviews.reviewText: I have been raised up in a Arm & Hammer family for as long as I can remember doing laundry as a child at the house I stayed in I remember always using this. My grandmother used the powder but I’m not a fan of that and have a HE top loading machine. I love this can be used for both machines. I filled the cap to line A like it say’s doesn’t look like much but I know how good arm and hammer is! That little bit is all you need, with any arm and hammer detergent, luckily I don’t have a toddler with very sensitive skin I do know all toddlers skin is more sensitive so when I saw this I decided to get it! I have tried different brands to get a more “free & clear” detergent but I have came to the conclusion that nothing other than this truly works for toddler stains and dirt and gets rid of the musky smell of sweat and dirt and stains. They have a more free and clear version but honestly I’m not worried about that anymore nor need it when the other detergents from arm & hammer haven’t irritated his skin or ours and this is the first sensitive skin jug I got and what’s funny is I have the odor blasters 106 loads in the big dispenser jug and this is 105 loads in 108 ounces and the jugs say the same line for medium loads so I’m bit confused on that unless you use more in the other one. I got sensitive skin mainly so my son doesn’t get irritated because things can change in a day with toddlers. I love having nice smelling clothes and using less detergent than other brands had me use and only $9 for all this that’s a deal the other brands I was paying $12-15 for a bottle. I pair the detergent with bounce sheets only dryer sheet I have used and recommend as well. Love the 2X more cleaning power so it can be used in both machines without having to use a different amount of detergent as I always look for that. It’s a win win with arm and hammer and I’m a user for life and not going back to tide or all or ecos (ecos sucks) and tried seventh generation before didn’t like it and was too much money. This is unbeatable and should be the most used laundry detergent in America and in households my mom used it as well and still does. Highly recommended and can’t wait to pop clothes out of wash and dry them and see how clean they are.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic detergent and love the scent!! Whoever packed it for shipment though, simply tossed it in a small flimsy box so it arrived leaking.

reviews.reviewText: I have been using this product for several years now. I am very pleased with it.I am really happy that I can purchase it via Amazon. They give me a great price and I don't have to lug this big container home!

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cleans well and I can tolerate the fragrance
reviews.reviewText: Just from the smell, it seems it will clean very effectively. Not too perfumery. I am using it just for laundry. My brands of choice are Cheer and Seventh Generation, their smells are great, but they cost more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Arm & Hammer is now my go to for laundry detergent
reviews.reviewText: I was a faithful Tide user for years before switching to Arm & Hammer Sensitive Skin Free and Clear. The reason for the switch was due to a sudden onset of skin allergies. It's not as bad as some people get but was bothersome so I went to see my doctor. I was given a diagnosis along with some allergy meds and a specific lotion for flare ups. I was also advised that I may want to look into products geared towards sensitive skin as this may end up being a recurring problem. I tried out Arm & Hammers Sensitive Skin Free and Clear and really liked it. I've been using it for a while and when I went to purchase this last time, it was out of stock. Not wanting to switch brands, I saw this Arm & Hammer Sensitive Skin Plus Fresh Scent and decided to order. It arrived timely and was boxed well with no leakage.I did laundry as normal and everything came out looking, feeling and smelling clean as I expected. I don't use fabric softener or fabric sheets due to the amount of athletic clothing we have. I use wood dryer balls instead. The detergent is hypoallergenic and dermatologist tested, making it a good option for people with sensitive skin. As far as the scent, it's fresh and mild and has not caused me any issues.You get a 105 fluid ounce bottle (approx. 105 small to medium sized loads) for the current listing price of $8.06, which is very inexpensive when compared to some other brands. I haven't had any skin problems since switching to Arm & Hammer so it will remain my go to brand for laundry.

reviews.reviewText: Got it at a great price and it works well with our HE washer.
